title: What Does Angel Number 144 Mean? Plus, What to Do When You See It

steps.title: Angel number 144 is a positive sign of growth and change.
steps.content: Angel number 144 is a positive sign of growth and change. Consider yourself incredibly lucky if you happen to see 144 popping up frequently in your everyday life. This number is a sign from your angels telling you that good things and positive changes are coming into your life soon. Whether it’s in your career, relationships, or personal life, 144 predicts a time of growth and improvement. [1] X Research source Your angels are also telling you to stay positive and look forward to the future. They want you to know that you’ve worked hard and can expect to be rewarded for your efforts.

steps.title: Why do you keep seeing 144?
steps.content: Why do you keep seeing 144? Your angels are telling you to focus on achieving your goals. 144 is a number that represents hard work and effort, as well as the positive results that can come from such dedication. Stay committed to your goals and give 110% of your best effort to achieve your dreams. If you do, you’ll likely be rewarded greatly. [2] X Research source Set specific goals and come up with actionable, realistic steps that’ll bring you closer to achieving them. For example, instead of saying, “I’m going to find a new job I like,” make it more specific by saying, “I’m going to find an internship related to a field I like and give it a try to see if it’s right for me.”

steps.title: If you’re single, someone special may enter your life soon.
steps.content: If you’re single, someone special may enter your life soon. The new beginnings and changes that 144 predicts can very well apply to your love life. If you’re single, you may end up meeting someone very special in the near future. Just keep an open mind and be willing to meet new people . [3] X Research source Instead of waiting for the One to come to you, make an effort to go out and make new connections. For example, say yes to going out with friends on the weekend, network with new people at work, or start a conversation with someone you’ve never talked to before. You never know when you’ll meet the right person.

steps.title: If you’re in a relationship, work on strengthening your bond.
steps.content: If you’re in a relationship, work on strengthening your bond. 144 is all about building strong foundations in order to achieve success in the future. If you’re in a relationship, put your energy toward strengthening core values such as honesty, good communication, and trust with your partner to ensure you’ll be together for a very long time. [4] X Research source For example, take some time to sit down with your partner and speak honestly about how you’re feeling and what you think of your relationship. Be a good listener to your partner and always be there to support them so that they know they can trust and rely on you.

steps.title: 144 predicts you may be reunited with your twin flame soon.
steps.content: 144 predicts you may be reunited with your twin flame soon. Your angels are sending you a positive sign that you may be meeting your twin flame in the very near future. If you haven’t met your twin flame yet, a face-to-face meeting might be written in the stars. Or, if you’ve been separated from your twin flame for a while, your reunion could very well be on the horizon. [5] X Research source If you’re not sure if you’ve met your twin flame yet, go ahead and take wikiHow’s “Have I Met My Twin Flame?” quiz to find out!

steps.title: Open yourself up to your twin flame to strengthen your bond.
steps.content: Open yourself up to your twin flame to strengthen your bond. 144 is telling you to form a strong connection and foundation with your twin flame in order to help your relationship flourish. To help achieve this, don’t be afraid to open up to them and allow yourself to be a bit vulnerable. By doing so, you’re letting your twin flame know that you trust them and are committed to keeping your connection strong. [6] X Research source This is especially helpful if you’re currently going through a twin flame separation. In order to reunite and continue forward with your twin flame, focus on being honest with them.

steps.title: Keep working hard to move forward in your career.
steps.content: Keep working hard to move forward in your career. 144 is a number that predicts positive transformations and growth in your professional career so long as you’re willing to put in the effort to make them happen. Put time and effort into your work so that you achieve the best results, and don’t hesitate to take advantage of new opportunities that can help push you forward. [7] X Research source If you have a plan you’ve been procrastinating, 144 is your sign to take action. Go after that promotion you’ve wanted for a while, ask your boss for a new project, or participate in extra trainings to add to your qualifications. If you’ve been thinking about switching careers , consider 144 the push you may have needed to start browsing job listings and networking.

steps.title: 144 is a reminder to focus on making smart financial choices.
steps.content: 144 is a reminder to focus on making smart financial choices. The message of stability and security that 144 promotes also applies to your finances. This might be a sign from your angels telling you to focus on budgeting, saving, and investing in order to create financial stability in your life and secure your future. For example, closely monitor your spending habits and create a budget for yourself to help save money. Or, consult with a financial advisor about ways you can save more money for the future.

steps.title: 144 urges you to confide in your spiritual guides.
steps.content: 144 urges you to confide in your spiritual guides. This number happens to be incredibly spiritual in nature and reveals that your guardian angels are closely watching over you. You’re receiving divine protection under the number 144, so don’t be afraid to turn to your angels when you most need them. They’ll listen to your prayers and help guide you toward the right path. [8] X Research source One way to contact your guardian angels is to say a prayer asking for their help. For example, say something like, “Thank you for watching over me all this time. I think things might get a bit difficult soon, and I could really use your help and guidance.”

steps.title: Now’s the time to manifest your dreams.
steps.content: Now’s the time to manifest your dreams. Any time 1 and 4 appear together in an angel number, they create a powerful symbol of manifesting your deepest desires. When you see 144, your angels are letting you know that now is the time to manifest your dreams and turn them into your reality. [9] X Research source Keep a positive attitude. If you believe something good will happen, the chances of it coming true are much higher. Use positive affirmations to boost your confidence and keep your spirits up. Every day, tell yourself things like, “Things are going to work out,” “I’m a strong and capable person,” and “I can do anything I set my mind to.”

steps.title: 1 symbolizes new beginnings and determination.
steps.content: 1 symbolizes new beginnings and determination. When you see the number 1 in any angel number, it’s usually a very positive sign. At its core, 1 represents a fresh start and one’s ability to take action to achieve their goals. It signals unavoidable change coming into your life, but it also predicts that you’ll be able to handle whatever changes come your way and achieve success. [10] X Research source 1 is also associated with positive thinking and the success that results from keeping a positive outlook on life.

steps.title: 4 is a sign of hard work and stability.
steps.content: 4 is a sign of hard work and stability. Seeing the number 4 in an angel number often means that you’re an incredibly hard-working person. You have strong foundations in your relationships, career, and personal life that will allow you to achieve success no matter what you do, and now’s the time to take a stand and go after the things you want. You have the tools to succeed—now it’s all about taking that first step and taking action. [11] X Research source Since 4 appears twice in 144, its message is even more powerful. The sum of 144 is 9 (1+4+4), which symbolizes wisdom and experience. Combined with the message of stability in 4, this might be a sign to rely on your logic, wisdom, and past experiences when making decisions. Keep in mind that 9 is also the highest change number (change on every level) and symbolizes the end of a cycle.

steps.title: 144 may be a sign of God’s ruling through humans.
steps.content: 144 may be a sign of God’s ruling through humans. Some people believe that the number 12 represents God’s perfect rule that He achieves through human agency. 144, being the product of 12 multiplied by itself (12x12), therefore enhances and emphasizes this message. [12] X Research source 144 may also be connected to the 144,000 men God had chosen to be His agents of salvation, as revealed in the book of Revelations.

steps.title: Choose things that make you happy.
steps.content: Choose things that make you happy. 144 is all about ushering positivity into your life. To help with this transformation, focus on yourself and the things that bring you true happiness. Instead of agonizing over making decisions, follow your instincts and choose the things that’ll bring you the most joy. Your angels want you to listen to your heart and will protect you every step of the way. [13] X Research source Be sure to also make an effort to bring a healthy balance to your life. Maintain a work-life balance by hanging out with friends, pursuing your hobbies, and taking some time to be by yourself.

steps.title: Let go of your worries and take risks.
steps.content: Let go of your worries and take risks. 144 is your angels’ way of telling you to take action and pursue your dreams. In order to do this, let go of your worries and don’t be afraid to step outside of your comfort zone . Go ahead and reach for the stars—your angels will make sure that you don’t fall. [14] X Research source Focus on living in the moment rather than getting caught up on past mistakes and negativities. Instead, concentrate on what you can do right now and the good things happening in your life.

steps.title: Be honest with yourself and others.
steps.content: Be honest with yourself and others. Speaking up and being honest with others is key to creating harmony in your relationships and personal life. Your angels are encouraging you to speak up when something’s on your mind and express your wants and needs. Doing so can definitely help build trust and even stronger foundations in your relationships as well as give you the strength to be proactive about going after what you want. [15] X Research source For example, don’t hesitate to sit down and have a serious talk with your partner if there’s something about your relationship that’s bothering you. Or, make an effort to give your opinion more often, even if it’s just about small things like where to eat, what movie to watch, or what to do over the weekend.
